page.title: 11TRADE C. CROOKHAM
page.content: { {The Verne Shops A group of us went down to the local shopping centre called the Verne. There were six shops there.Most of the shops had been there for 21 years.There is a small V.G super market a hair dresser's and a fruit and vegetable shop. A newsagent, an off licence and a hardware shop with a post office inside. {Aldershot Road. 1 take away hot food shop, 1 supermarket, 1 clothing shop,1 d.i.y. store ,Woopee motor,2 garages with service and petrol stations. {Linkway.}10 shops.= Gent's Hairdresser's, D.I.Y. Hardware store,Ladies' Hairdresser's, Supermarket.(Spar),Chemist, Grocer+flowers, Butcher's, Baker's, Solicitors'Office. And 2 car parks. .
